definitions.title: n.pr.m. Sihon
definitions.body: (on format. cf. Lag:BN 198);—[[סִיחוֹן]] Nu 21:27 + 18 t., [[סִיחׂן]] v:Nu 21:21 + 17 t.;—king of Amorites, Nu 21:21 + 7 t. Nu 21 (JE), Nu 32:33 (R) De 1:4 + 10 t. Dt, Ju Jdg 2:10 + 4 t. Ju (D) + Jdg 13:21, Jdg 13:21, 13:27 (P), Jdg 11:19, Jdg 11:20, Jdg 11:20, Jdg 11:21, Je 48:45, 1Ki 4:19, Ne 9:22, Ps 135:11, Ps 136:19. LXX Shwn, LXXL Siwn.
